seo.title: About {{brand.fullName}} | Our Story & Mission
seo.description: 1930s art-deco pub on Newmarket Road blending HD sports with authentic Nepalese cuisine, heated cabins, and a warm Cambridge welcome.

openGraph.title: About {{brand.shortName}} – Pints, Momos, and Matchday Energy
openGraph.description: How a historic Cambridge pub became the city’s go-to sports pub with a full Nepalese kitchen and cosy snugs.

hero.title: About {{brand.shortName}}
hero.subtitle: Cambridge’s go-to sports pub with Nepalese plates and cosy snugs on Newmarket Road.

story.title: Our Story
story.introduction: Built in the 1930s as a corner pub, {{brand.shortName}} now pairs authentic Nepalese cooking with a lively sports bar atmosphere. After earning CAMRA’s Most Improved City Pub award in 2020, the pub entered a new chapter in late 2024 under Lapen Inns, installing a Nepalese kitchen while keeping real ale, HD screens, and the community spirit alive.

timeline.title: Art-deco corner pub opens
timeline.description: {{brand.shortName}} takes its place on Newmarket Road, becoming a local landmark with its distinctive facade and fireplaces.

timeline.title: CAMRA ‘Most Improved City Pub’
timeline.description: Recognised by Cambridge & District CAMRA for revitalising beer quality and the community pub experience.

timeline.title: Nepalese kitchen & sports hub relaunch
timeline.description: Lapen Inns integrates a full Nepalese menu (momos, Himali Lamb, Chicken Rum Rum) with HD sports, heated garden cabins, and family-friendly service.

timeline.title: Travelers’ Choice & 5★ hygiene
timeline.description: Tripadvisor Travelers’ Choice 2025 plus a 5-star food hygiene rating underscore consistent quality and care.

cta.title: Visit {{brand.shortName}}
cta.description: Book a table or heated cabin, catch the match, and enjoy authentic Nepalese dishes alongside British pub favourites.
